content.question:
(a) Using the data in the graph, describe a trend in the data for the extent of censorship of the media in Mexico between 2000 and 2018. Explain a possible reason for this trend.

(b) Using the data in the graph and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion about the relationship between democratic consolidation and censorship of the media in Mexico.

(c) Explain why government censorship of the media in Mexico differs from government censorship of the media in the United Kingdom.
